post.body: no MSN on my mac. For now + an overview read this http://budurl.com/k9sm and comment. I will elaborate as we go.
well it's nice to have someone to tweet with in same time zone when USA is sleeping. LOL. Guess u know ppl like Stuart Tan then?
yup been in the social media game since 2005 and loving it. it's changing business, marketing, freedom of speech, politics, u name it
Twitter started in March 2006. More in Wikipedia dude ;-) So ur Singaporean? Me in Malaysia. Similar time zone. USA sleeping now
my pleasure. Didn't know, but way to go. Wishing you your 1000th. Thanks for spreading the word. Happy 09.
LOVE your stuff man. Genuine, no BS hype. My friend and former MindValley colleague @emailcopywriter speaks highly of you.
"I believe in you, and in your potential, that's why I care" - makes huge difference if truly meant when said. how u say matters
same here. and imagine if u forgot the volume of the spearkers set pretty loud. not nice. been reading ur site. good stuff! :)
LOVE it. Yup, and the reasons too often are fear and comfort zone. Here's to the DESTRUCTION of all our comfort zones. ;-)
SMM Tip: Start Facebook group. Blast friendly msgs. Wid right approach, u get higher open rate than email + 1more channel 2communicate thru
Social Media Marketing Tip: Exploit the "Popeye Spinach" Effect & boost your profits. Integration is d name of d game http://budurl.com/k9sm
FACT: Passion breeds motivation and pushes u beyond ur self-defeating fears. Nurture it. Value it. Light it on FIRE!
RT @PerryBelcher Privacy Sucks In Social Media http://tinyurl.com/9uhsl7
Excellent SMM tool: www.SocialMention.com Quickly find out who's talking about u or ur stuff. Love it Looks neat Loads a little slow though.
08 SocialMedia Lesson: It's mostly NOT about d tech: Twitter, Fcbook, Squidoo, bla bla bla. Tech is JUST enabler. Keep It Human. Hi there :)
